name: Circus Bombus
description:
The Game---------------------------------------------------------------

How do you solve a scheduling conflict between two circuses? 

With Circus Bombus of course. Circus Bombus is an energetic and family friendly 2D top down, player versus player arcade game. Roll our hand-made wheels to push the minecarts with the confetti filled bombs. First one to get the opposite circus covered with confetti wins. 

 Which circus will you side with?

Circus Bombus was developed in Unity for PC. (edited)

To get the true experience you need to have our hand-made table with our hand-made wheel controls. 

Controls---------------------------------------------------------------

If you decide to play it with a keyboard:

Yellow team has the keys Q, A, Z. 

Purple team has the keys I, K, M.

Q and I controls the upper cart

A and K controls the middle cart 

Z and M controls the lower cart

The Team-----------------------------------------------------------------

Jakub Orlowski - Product Owner & Programmer

Achim Helmers - Tech Designer & Craftsman

Daria Shpak - 2D Artist

Dhruv Gulabani - 2D Artist

Marcus Landley - Team Producer

William Karlsson - QA & Craftsman
